name: StreetsOfDank Demo v1.4
description:
Controls
  • Keyboard: WASD to move.  SHIFT to run.  J, K to use normal attacks., U, I to use special attacks.
  • Gamepad: Left analog stick to move. ZL to run.  Y, B to use normal attacks.  X, A to use special attacks.  (Nintendo Switch button layout)
    • (Tested with Nyko Wireless Core Controller.)
  • Mobile: Press "Touch" toggle on top right corner to use touchscreen controls.
    • (Tested on Android Firefox.)
